name: Noise.
description:
Welcome to the finest quality you'll ever find on this cursed website. In this "game", you Experience The Noise in his full glory. There are a few secrets in the game.

"what in the actual fuck was Applemunch thinking when he mades this shit???" -Super Piter, 4/19/2020

Controls:

Move Mouse - Move Noise
Left Click - woag

Discord server: https://discord.gg/ajeaEZfUUe
WARINING: You'll find people banned from the Pizza Tower Discord inside of the server. Be careful.
